metadata.title: Multichannel Seismic-Reflection Data Beaufort and Chukchi Seas - Alaskan Outer Continental Shelf

creators.name: Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), National Environmental Satellite, Data
Information Service (NESDIS), National Geophysical Data Center (NGDC)

metadata.description:
Approximately 5,700 line km of 24-channel seismic reflection data
are now available over the Continental shelf, slope, and rise in
the Beaufort Sea and the Continental Shelf in the Chukchi Sea
north of Alaska.  The data were collected from the U.S.
Geological Survey (USGS) Research Vessel SAMUEL P. LEE from late
August through early October 1977.*
